qa.name: Sophie
qa.appearance: Petite with curly red hair and freckles
qa.clothing: Colorful overalls and a striped t-shirt

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the blink of an eye, my imaginary world became real.
json_to_edit.description: Sophie's imaginary friend, Mr. Whiskers, suddenly materializes in her bedroom.
json_to_edit.name: Imaginary Reality
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Sophie's imaginary friend, Mr. Whiskers, unexpectedly becomes real in her bedroom.

qa.action: Sophie's colorful bedroom, filled with drawings and stuffed animals, bathed in moonlight.

hf.action: Sophie sitting on her bed, talking animatedly to an empty space beside her.

tr.action: Sophie's eyes widening in disbelief as sparkles begin to form in the air.

xc.action: A swirl of glittering particles coalescing into the form of a large, fluffy cat-like creature.

ka.action: Mr. Whiskers, now real, opening his bright blue eyes and blinking at Sophie.

fn.action: Sophie jumping off the bed in excitement as Mr. Whiskers stretches and hops down.

af.action: Sophie hugging Mr. Whiskers tightly, her face buried in his soft fur.

qo.action: Sophie's hand gently stroking Mr. Whiskers' fur, which sparkles slightly at her touch.

fp.action: Mr. Whiskers exploring the room, sniffing at toys and batting at hanging mobiles.

va.action: Sophie and Mr. Whiskers curled up together on the bed, both drifting off to sleep.

edit_command: Add a new shot every three existing shots, making sure not to change anything else in the scene.

label.rationale: we will add new shots to the scene, inserting them after every three existing shots. this will increase the total number of shots from 10 to 13. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field accordingly. we'll also update the "list_display_order" to include the new shots and adjust the json structure. the new shots will be creative and consistent with the scene's magical and whimsical atmosphere.
